channel.title: Extruded Polystyrene on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Extruded Polystyrene on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: It’s Not Styrofoam
item.description: Today in Tedium: In the age of instant takeout, there may be no greater scourge than polystyrene, a necessary evil of many a food delivery. New York City, famously, tried to ban the foamy substance before a judge struck down the ban. And lots of other cities have tried to follow suit—most aggressively San Francisco, and most recently Bangor, Maine. Heck, the entire state of Maryland is considering a big ban.
